code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/kaiten/prgmStuff/adress-book/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";export var getContacts=function getContacts(){var contacts=localStorage.getItem('contacts');return contacts?JSON.parse(contacts):[];};export var saveToLocalStorage=function saveToLocalStorage(contacts){localStorage.setItem('contacts',JSON.stringify(contacts));};export var sortContacts=function sortContacts(contacts,sortField,isAscending){if(sortField===undefined)return[];var sortedContacts=_toConsumableArray(contacts).sort(function(a,b){var valueA=a[sortField].toLowerCase();var valueB=b[sortField].toLowerCase();return isAscending?valueA.localeCompare(valueB):valueB.localeCompare(valueA);});return sortedContacts;};
